title: Vanilla Ice Cream
meta: Kitchen Aid Mixer attachment takes 30 mins on 'stir' setting.

directions.text: Split the bean, and scrape out the seeds.
Combine all ingredients in a pan, including the full bean.
Stir over low heat until the temperature hits 170Â°.
Remove the bean hull and refrigerate overnight.
Mix mixture in an ice cream maker, and freeze for at least 1 hour.
